pages.text: $(italic)What makes Glow Squids so special is them lighting your way in the darkness of the caves. As beautiful as they are, they seem to wash ashore far too often and meet their sad end there.$(br)You honor their clumsy glowing legacy by designing a headdress that can continue guiding you in the darkness of the caves.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Glow Vision helmet offers very little protection, but if you are in a dark area and have Glow Ink Sacs on you, you get the Night Vision effect.
